summary: This is an email exchange between an Assistant United States Attorney and another individual regarding scheduling interviews related to the Epstein investigation. The email discusses upcoming interviews with inmates and coordination of attendance.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email response, coordinating attendance at interviews related to the Epstein investigation.

persons.name: (USANYS)
persons.context: Sender of the initial email who provided information about upcoming Epstein investigation interviews and scheduled meetings.

connections.description: Colleagues or professional contacts coordinating schedules for Epstein investigation interviews.

events.title: Epstein Investigation Interview
events.description: An interview relating to the Epstein investigation scheduled for Tuesday at 12:30 PM.

events.title: Inmate Interview for Epstein Investigation
events.description: Another interview of an inmate relating to the Epstein investigation scheduled for Friday at 12:00 PM.

locations: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York, One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The email exchange occurred on September 9-10, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in August 2019.
The Southern District of New York was actively conducting interviews related to the Epstein investigation in September 2019.
The interviews involved speaking with inmates, suggesting the investigation was examining prison conditions or witness testimony from incarcerated individuals.
The correspondence shows coordination between prosecutors regarding investigative activities post-Epstein's death.
